objectives: Mate The Bloated Miller então enter town
Hand in quests and head out to Clearfell
Mate Beira of the Rotten Pack. She's North/North East of the waypoint. Recompensa: 10% Cold Res.
Encontre the entrance to The Grelwood.
Encontre the waypoint and talk to the quest NPC. Usually central.
Encontre the entrance to The Grim Tangle
take the waypoint
and go back to The Grelwood.
Encontre the entrance to The Red Vale and go through.
Encontre the three obelisks and get the three quest items.
After getting the third
WP to town and talk to Renly to acquire the Runed Spikes. WP to The Grelwood.
Summon and talk to Una.
Stab the tree with your runed spikes então talk to Una.
Go back to town
talk to NPCs
então head to The Grim Tangle via waypoint to The Grelwood.
Encontre the entrance to the Cemetery of The Eternals. The Druid boss can be skipped.
Encontre Mausoleum of the Praetor and mate the boss in there.
Encontre the Tomb of the Consort and mate the boss in there.
Fale com Lachlann
open the gate
and mate him. ☹
Entre em Hunting Grounds
Encontre and mate The Crowbell. Recompensa: two smate points.
Encontre and enter Ogham Farmlands.
Encontre Una's lute. Usually around the center of the zone. Recompensa: 2 smate points.
Encontre and mate Vargir The Feral Mutt in the Crop Circle. Drops a level 4 smate gem.
Encontre and take the entrance to Ogham Village and WP back to the Hunting Grounds.
Encontre and enter Freythorn.
Do all 4 rituals
mateing The King in the Mists at the end. Recompensa: 30 spirit.
TP de volta para a cidade and waypoint to Ogham Village.
If it's your first character of the league; Encontre Smithing Tools.
Encontre and mate The Executioner
Go to The Manor Ramparts
Encontre the entrance to to Ogham Manor. This is always in the opposite direction of the waypoint after you zone in.
Encontre and mate Candlemass
the Living Rite
Encontre and go down escadas twice
Encontre elevator to boss
mate boss
volte para a cidade
If it's your first character of the league; Fale com Renly to turn in the smithing tools
Fale com The Hooded One to vá para act 2
Encontre and mate Rathbreaker
Portal back to camp
enter The Ardura Caravan
Converse com todos então use the desert map to vá para Mawdun Quarry
Encontre and take the entrance to Mawdun Mine
Encontre and mate Rudja
the Dread Engineer
Fale com Risu então portal back to town
Fale com Risu
então use desert map to vá para The Halani Gates gates
Fale com Sekhema Asala at the gates
go back to the caravan
talk to Risu again
então to Sekhema Asala again
Use desert map to vá para The Halani Gates gates again
Encontre and mate Basala
pick up the Djinn Barya quest item
Encontre the entrance to The Halani Gates
Encontre and mate Jamanra
the Risen King. Stay close to the canyon. Cross the canyon 3 times to find the boss.
Go down the escadas and to the bottom right of the zone
então back to town
Use o mapa do deserto para vá para the Trial of Sekhemas
Fale com everyone
então use desert map to vá para Keth
Mate Kabala
Constrictor Queen
the constrictor queen. Recompensa: 2 smate points.
Mate snakes until you find the Kabala Clan relic.
Encontre and enter The Lost City
Encontre Entrance and vá para Buried Shrines
então the Heart of Keth
Mate Azarian
the Forsaken Son
Fale com Halani
the Water Goddess
pegue the cinders
queime the goddess
pegue the essence of water.
Volte para a cidade.
Use desert map to vá para Mastodon Badlands
Encontre the Entrance to The Bone Pits
Encontre and mate the zone boss and pegue the horn
Mate Hyenas until you found the sun clan relic
TP de volta para a cidade.
Use desert map to vá para Valley of the Titans
Encontre and click the three ancient seals
Encontre the medallion and place the two relics in there. Recompensa: a permanent buff.
Encontre and take the entrance to The Titan Grotto
Encontre and mate the boss
então volte para a cidade
Fale com Zarka
então Sekhema Asala
Use o mapa do deserto para travel to the halani gates
Go to the front of the caravan and sound the horn
Use o mapa do deserto para travel to Deshar
Encontre the final letter on a corpse on the ground. Recompensa: two smate points on hand in.
Encontre the entrance to the path of mourning
Go the The Path of Mourning
Encontre the entrance to The Spires of Deshar
Encontre the sisters of Garukhan
Encontre and mate Tor Gul
the Defiler
Portal de volta para a cidade
Entregue the final letter at Shambrin
Fale com everyone
então use desert map to vá para The Dreadnought
Encontre the entrance to The Dreadnought vanguard
então find and mate Jamanra
the Abomination
Portal de volta para a cidade
Saia the Caravan and talk to The Hooded One
Go back to the Caravan and talk to Sekhema Asala to vá para Act 3
Encontre the entrance to the Ziggurat Encampment (town).
Fale com everyone and entrance into Jungle Ruins
Encontre the entrance to The Venom Crypts (near waypoint)
Encontre and mate Mighty Silverfist
Encontre and go through the entrance to Infested Barrens
Encontre the entrance to Chimeral Wetlands. Entre em zone
pegue o ponto de passagem
backtrack to Infested Barrens.
Encontre the entrance to The Azak Bog. Entre em zone
pegue o ponto de passagem
backtrack to Infested Barrens.
Encontre the entrance to The Matlan Waterways and the waypoint.
Zone 'Note': Whichever waypoint you find last
use it to travel back to Jungle Ruins.
Entre em The Venom Crypts
Encontre the corpse for the venom phial
então volte para a cidade
Go back to town
turn in phial at Servi for a reward. This can not be changed later.
Go to The Azak Bog.
Optional': Encontre the Flameskin ritual and activate all
it gives 25% fire res and rarity for the rest of the zone
Encontre and mate Ignagduk
the Bog Witch. Recompensa: 30 spirit.
Go back to town and então to The Chimeral Wetlands
Encontre the temple/Trial of Chaos.
Encontre and mate Xyclucian
the Chimera
Entre em Jiquani's Machinarium
Encontre the first small soul core
então open the door
Encontre two more small soul cores
Encontre the entrance towards Jiquani's Sanctum
Encontre and mate Blackjaw
the Remnant. Recompensa: 10% fire res.
Checkpoint port to the entrance
então vá para Jiquani's Sanctum
Don't forget the activate the waypoint right after the entry.
Fale com Alva
Encontre two medium soul cores
Ative both generators. Coloque um portal ANTES DE you activate the second generator.
Portal de volta para a cidade and waypoint back to the Jiquani's Sanctum.
Mate Zicoatl
Warden of the Core and pegue the large soul core
Go back to Infested Barrens waypoint
Insert the large soul core and vá para The Matlan Waterways afterwards
Ative every single lever to navigate through the zone
então activate the big one at the end
Tp back to town
Go down the escadas near the well / The Hooded One
Fale com Alva
enter The Drowned City
If it's your first character of the league; Encontre the entrance to The Molten Vault. Entre em zone
pegue o ponto de passagem
backtrack to The Drowned City.
Encontre the entrance to The Apex of Filth. Entre em zone
pegue o ponto de passagem
and if it's your first character of the league; backtrack to The Drowned City.
If it's your first character of the league; Entre em the Molten Vault. Otherwise enter The Apex of Filth.
Encontre and mate the boss
então talk to Oswald back in town
Entre em The Apex of Filth
Encontre and mate The Queen of Filth
então portal back to town
Go down the escadas near the well / The Hooded One again
and enter The Temple of Kopec
Go up the escadas twice
então mate Ketzuli
High Priest of the Sun
Fale com Alva and ride the elevator up
Atravesse o portal
então down the escadas again to enter Utzaal
Search and mate Viper Napuatzi.
Encontre the entrance to Aggorat and enter Aggorat.
Follow the voices of the Trial of Atziri
go through to find the next checkpoint
Encontre the entrance towards The Black Chambers
Encontre the sacrificial table
Farm The Sacrificial Heart if you haven't found it yet.
Use the checkpoint to go the sacrificial table
pegue the dagger
place the heart
perfure o coração
Use the checkpoint to vá para The Black Chambers

Royal Thaumaturge
Port back to town
